Top Interview Ques & Ans Practice More...
OPERATING\nSYSTEM "software that manages and controls computer hardware and software resources."
DATABASE\nMANAGEMENT\nSYSTEM "software that facilitates the organization, storage, retrieval, and management of data in a database."
OBJECT\nORIENTED\nPROGRAMMING\nSYSTEM "paradigm that emphasizes the use of objects and classes to structure code."
COMPUTER\nNETWORKING "involves the interconnection of computers and other devices to enable communication and data sharing over a network."
OPERATING SYSTEM DATABASE MANAGEMENT SYSTEM OOPS COMPUTER NETWORKING
Answer
My Notes
What is Operating System and its basic functions? What are the different types of Operating System? Difference between Program, Process and Thread. What is difference between Multi-Programming, Multi-Tasking and Multi-Threading? What is Kernel and write its main functions? What are different types of Kernels? Difference between Microkernel and Monolithic kernel. What is Inter Process Communication? What are the different IPC mechanisms? What do you mean by System Calls? Discuss types of System Call? What is bootstrap program in OS? Pending.... What is Process and its architecture? What are different states of Process? What is Process Control Block (PCB) and its attributes/fields?
What is OOPS? What is Class and Object? What are access specifiers? What is the difference between Public, Private and Protected access modifiers? What is Encapsulation? What is Abstraction? What is Inheritance? Discuss the types of Inheritance. What are Pure Virtual Functions? What is Polymorphism? What is Static Data member and Static Function? What is a Constructor? What is Destructor? What is Friend function? What is this pointer in C++? What are Virtual Functions? What is an Abstract Class?
What is Network? Explain different types of network. What is Topology? Explain types of topologies. What is IPv4 address? What are the different classes of IPv4? What is difference between Static IP address and Dynamic IP address? What is difference between Public IP address and Private IP address? Describe the OSI Reference Model. Describe the TCP/IP reference model. What are the HTTP and the HTTPS protocol? What is the SMTP protocol? What is DNS? What is the TCP protocol? What is the UDP protocol? What is the ICMP protocol? What do you mean by the DHCP Protocol? What are Unicasting, Anycasting, Multicasting and Broadcasting? What is the firewall? What is the MAC address and how is it related to NIC? Differentiate the MAC address with the IP address. Compare The Hub vs Switch
What is Database? What is DBMS? What is RDBMS? How is it different from DBMS? What is SQL? What is the difference between SQL and MySQL? What are Constraints in SQL? What is Normalization? What are the various forms of Normalization? What is Functional Dependency? What are the TRUNCATE, DELETE and DROP statements? What are ACID properties?
